message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can work out a better deal later if you want.
My turn! How about a 60/40 split?  It's important we reach a deal soon.
Let's be reasonable. I'll take 70%, but I'm willing to negotiate further. We need to get this done before things get worse for both of us.
Time is running out!  Let's split the difference from my last offer - 55/45.
